item.title: 2021-11-30-quiz
item.description:
There will be another QUIZ on Friday, the 3rd of December on material that was not covered until the last quiz (whatever was covered during the lectures on the 25th and 29th of November, 2021). I will drop one more quiz score so you may use this quiz to improve your average quiz score.

item.description:
